   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Pycoast
=======

Pycoast is a Python package to add coastlines, borders and rivers to raster
images using data from the GSHHS and WDBII datasets

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   installation
   usage
   high_quality_contours
   graticule
   test
   api
